item.title: Perception Is Reality
item.description: Was writing a few posts on being a man of actions, not being scared of the future and remembering only action matters. Not scared of future It’s Not What I Am Underneath it’s What I Do Defines Me Excerpts from notion kbs Confidence is the key, if you believe in you the world will believe in you. Perception is reality, how people perceive you is how they behave around you and that is real, it doesn’t matter if their perception is an accurate depiction of you or not because it doesn’t matter.
